players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I suspect Bob might be the mafia."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and found them the mafioso. Alice was killed last night too. Let's vote Charlie."
Charlie: "I think Bob might be lying; he's the mafia. I had no time to investigate him. Diana seems suspicious too."
Diana: "Bob, if you were detective you wouldn't falsely accuse Charlie. I think you're the mafia. Let's vote Bob."
Charlie: "Bob, I didn't investigate you. Why would you accuse me? I suspect you may be lying. Diana, I have no reason to suspect you. Vote me."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and found him the mafia. Alice was killed. No reason to suspect me as mafia. Let's vote Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
